about_the_game:
The Original Soundtrack for Equilibrium Of Divinity. The soundtrack contains 30 tracks with a runtime of over 50 minutes.

Tracklist:

- Equilibrium Of Divinity - Main Theme
- Against All Odds
- Ancient World
- Bastion
- Crypts
- Dark Fortress
- Encampment
- Eternal Prison
- Fire Realms
- For Glory
- Adventure Awaits
- Forsaken Cavern
- Haunted
- Heaven
- Hell
- Hive
- Ice Palace
- Lair
- Madhouse
- Memories
- Mines
- Restless Sea
- Sanctuary
- Savage Nature
- Shadow Castle
- Swamp
- Temple
- The Lab
- To Victory
- Underground Village
